title: Tren linh vuc chinh tri: Ban linh cong dan tre
lead: Thanh nien can tham gia doi song chinh tri - xa hoi bang nhan thuc dung, thai do xay dung va hanh dong co trach nhiem.

sections.heading: Muc tieu
items: Xay dung lop cong dan tre hieu phap luat, ton trong ky cuong va biet tranh bien co can cu.
Tang nang luc mien dich thong tin truoc tin gia va noi dung kich dong tren moi truong so.

sections.quote: Ly tuong cach mang phai duoc the hien bang hanh dong cu the trong hoc tap, lao dong va phuc vu cong dong.
sections.author: Trich huong dan hoc tap

items.title: Nang cao hieu biet phap luat
items.detail: Tham gia cac buoi sinh hoat chinh tri, cap nhat van ban moi va thuc hanh ky nang lap luan.

items.title: Tham gia to chuc doan hoi
items.detail: Rieng tung vai tro deu huong den muc tieu chung: ky luat, doan ket, phuc vu cong dong.

items.title: Ung xu van minh tren khong gian so
items.detail: Kiem chung thong tin truoc khi chia se, ton trong su that va khuyen khich doi thoai tich cuc.

sections.heading: Minh chung thuc tien
sections.label: THUC TIEN
sections.text: Nhi?u mo hinh thanh nien tu quan va dien dan doi thoai tre da giup ket noi y kien nguoi hoc voi nha truong va dia phuong.
